articles.title: Bette Midler hits back at fans who accused her of being transphobic - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actress, 76, took to Twitter to clarify her post was referencing a New York Times piece which had been published in the wake of the Supreme Court's overturning of Roe V Wade.
articles.content:
Bette Midler has hit back at social media users who accused her of being transphobic, after she claimed that women were 'being erased' through the use of terms 'menstruators' and 'birthing people.'
